00001 /**********************************************************doxygen*//** @file
00002  * @brief   Cost matrix functions for the Balanced TSP.
00003  *
00004  * Cost matrix transformation functions for the balanced traveling
00005  * salesman problem (BalTSP).
00006  *
00007  * @author  John LaRusic
00008  * @ingroup lib
00009  ****************************************************************************/

00016 /**
00017  *  @brief  Info for shake type I cost matrix function.
00018  */
00019 typedef struct baltsp_shake_data
00020 {
00021     int infinity;               /**< value to use for "infinity" */
00022     arrow_problem_info *info;   /**< problem info */
00023     int random_min;             /**< minimum random number generated */
00024     int random_max;             /**< maximum random number generated */
00025     int *random_list;           /**< random list of integers */
00026     int random_list_length;     /**< random list length */
00027 } baltsp_shake_data;

00205 int
00206 arrow_baltsp_fun_basic(int shallow, arrow_btsp_fun *fun)
00207 {    
00208     fun->data = NULL;
00209     fun->shallow = shallow;
00210     fun->get_cost = baltsp_basic_get_cost;
00211     fun->initialize = baltsp_basic_initialize;
00212     fun->destruct = baltsp_basic_destruct;
00213     fun->feasible = baltsp_basic_feasible;
00214     return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00215 }
00216 
00217 int
00218 arrow_baltsp_fun_ut(int shallow, arrow_btsp_fun *fun)
00219 {    
00220     fun->data = NULL;
00221     fun->shallow = shallow;
00222     fun->get_cost = baltsp_ut_get_cost;
00223     fun->initialize = baltsp_basic_initialize;
00224     fun->destruct = baltsp_basic_destruct;
00225     fun->feasible = baltsp_ut_feasible;
00226     return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00227 }
00228 
00229 int
00230 arrow_baltsp_fun_shake(int shallow, int infinity, 
00231                        int random_min, int random_max,
00232                        arrow_problem_info *info, arrow_btsp_fun *fun)
00233 {
00234     fun->data = NULL;
00235     if((fun->data = malloc(sizeof(baltsp_shake_data))) == NULL)
00236     {
00237         arrow_print_error("Could not allocate memory for baltsp_shake_data");
00238         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00239     }
00240     
00241     baltsp_shake_data *shake_data = (baltsp_shake_data *)fun->data;
00242     shake_data->infinity = infinity;
00243     shake_data->info = info;
00244     
00245     shake_data->random_min = random_min;
00246     shake_data->random_max = random_max;
00247     shake_data->random_list_length = info->cost_list_length;
00248     
00249     if(!arrow_util_create_int_array(shake_data->random_list_length,
00250                                     &(shake_data->random_list)))
00251     {
00252         arrow_print_error("Could not allocate memory for random list");
00253         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00254     }
00255     
00256     fun->shallow = shallow;
00257     fun->get_cost = baltsp_shake_get_cost;
00258     fun->initialize = baltsp_shake_initialize;
00259     fun->destruct = baltsp_shake_destruct;
00260     fun->feasible = baltsp_basic_feasible;
00261     
00262     return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00263 }
00264 
00265 int
00266 arrow_baltsp_fun_ib(int shallow, arrow_btsp_fun *fun)
00267 {    
00268     fun->data = NULL;
00269     fun->shallow = shallow;
00270     fun->get_cost = baltsp_ib_get_cost;
00271     fun->initialize = baltsp_basic_initialize;
00272     fun->destruct = baltsp_basic_destruct;
00273     fun->feasible = baltsp_ib_feasible;
00274     return ARROW_SUCCESS;

00277 int
00278 arrow_baltsp_fun_dt2(int shallow, int random_min, int random_max,
00279                      arrow_problem_info *info, arrow_btsp_fun *fun)
00280 {
00281     fun->data = NULL;
00282     if((fun->data = malloc(sizeof(baltsp_shake_data))) == NULL)
00283     {
00284         arrow_print_error("Could not allocate memory for baltsp_shake_data");
00285         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00286     }
00287     
00288     baltsp_shake_data *shake_data = (baltsp_shake_data *)fun->data;
00289     shake_data->infinity = INT_MAX;
00290     shake_data->info = info;
00291     
00292     shake_data->random_min = random_min;
00293     shake_data->random_max = random_max;
00294     shake_data->random_list_length = info->cost_list_length;
00295     
00296     if(!arrow_util_create_int_array(shake_data->random_list_length,
00297                                     &(shake_data->random_list)))
00298     {
00299         arrow_print_error("Could not allocate memory for random list");
00300         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00301     }
00302     
00303     fun->shallow = shallow;
00304     fun->get_cost = baltsp_dt2_get_cost;
00305     fun->initialize = baltsp_dt2_initialize;
00306     fun->destruct = baltsp_shake_destruct;
00307     fun->feasible = baltsp_dt2_feasible;
00308     
00309     return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00310 }

00312 /****************************************************************************
00313  * Private function implementations
00314  ****************************************************************************/
00315 int
00316 baltsp_basic_get_cost(arrow_btsp_fun *fun, arrow_problem *base_problem,
00317                     int min_cost, int max_cost, int i, int j)
00318 {
00319     int cost = base_problem->get_cost(base_problem, i, j);
00320     
00321     if((cost >= min_cost) && (cost <= max_cost))
00322         return 0;
00323     else
00324         return cost + 1;
00325 }
00326 
00327 int
00328 baltsp_basic_initialize(arrow_btsp_fun *fun)
00329 { 
00330     return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00331 }
00332 
00333 void
00334 baltsp_basic_destruct(arrow_btsp_fun *fun)
00335 { }
00336 
00337 int
00338 baltsp_basic_feasible(arrow_btsp_fun *fun, arrow_problem *base_problem, 
00339                    int min_cost, int max_cost, double tour_length, int *tour)
00340 {
00341     return (tour_length == 0 ? ARROW_TRUE : ARROW_FALSE);
00342 }
00343 
00344 int
00345 baltsp_ut_get_cost(arrow_btsp_fun *fun, arrow_problem *base_problem,
00346                     int min_cost, int max_cost, int i, int j)
00347 {
00348     int cost = base_problem->get_cost(base_problem, i, j);
00349     int infinity = base_problem->size * (max_cost - min_cost + 1);
00350     
00351     if((cost >= min_cost) && (cost <= max_cost))
00352         return max_cost - cost;
00353     else
00354         return infinity;
00355 }
00356 
00357 int
00358 baltsp_ut_feasible(arrow_btsp_fun *fun, arrow_problem *base_problem, 
00359                    int min_cost, int max_cost, double tour_length, int *tour)
00360 {
00361     int infinity = base_problem->size * (max_cost - min_cost + 1);
00362     return (tour_length < infinity ? ARROW_TRUE : ARROW_FALSE);
00363 }
00364 
00365 int
00366 baltsp_shake_get_cost(arrow_btsp_fun *fun, arrow_problem *base_problem,
00367                       int min_cost, int max_cost, int i, int j)
00368 {
00369     baltsp_shake_data *data = (baltsp_shake_data *)fun->data;
00370     int cost = base_problem->get_cost(base_problem, i, j);
00371     
00372     if((cost >= min_cost) && (cost <= max_cost))
00373         return 0;
00374     else
00375     {
00376         int pos = -1;
00377         if(!arrow_problem_info_cost_index(data->info, cost, &pos))
00378         {
00379             arrow_print_error("Could not find cost in ordered cost list!");
00380             return data->infinity;
00381         }
00382         return cost + data->random_list[pos] + 1;
00383     }        
00384 }
00385 
00386 int
00387 baltsp_shake_initialize(arrow_btsp_fun *fun)
00388 { 
00389     int val;
00390     baltsp_shake_data *data = (baltsp_shake_data *)fun->data;
00391     
00392     /* Need to generate a new list of random numbers */
00393     arrow_bintree tree;
00394     arrow_bintree_init(&tree);
00395     while(tree.size < data->random_list_length)
00396     {
00397         val = arrow_util_random_between(data->random_min, data->random_max);
00398         arrow_bintree_insert(&tree, val);
00399     }
00400     arrow_bintree_to_array(&tree, data->random_list);
00401     arrow_bintree_destruct(&tree);
00402     
00403     return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00404 }
00405 
00406 void
00407 baltsp_shake_destruct(arrow_btsp_fun *fun)
00408 {
00409     if(fun->data != NULL)
00410     {
00411         baltsp_shake_data *data = (baltsp_shake_data *)fun->data;
00412         free(data->random_list);
00413         
00414         free(fun->data);
00415         fun->data = NULL;
00416     }
00417 }
00418 
00419 int
00420 baltsp_ib_get_cost(arrow_btsp_fun *fun, arrow_problem *base_problem,
00421                     int min_cost, int max_cost, int i, int j)
00422 {
00423     int cost = base_problem->get_cost(base_problem, i, j);
00424     int infinity = base_problem->size * (max_cost + 1);
00425     
00426     if(cost >= min_cost)
00427         return cost;
00428     else
00429         return infinity;
00430 }
00431 
00432 int
00433 baltsp_ib_feasible(arrow_btsp_fun *fun, arrow_problem *base_problem, 
00434                    int min_cost, int max_cost, double tour_length, int *tour)
00435 {
00436     int infinity = base_problem->size * (max_cost + 1);
00437     return (tour_length < infinity ? ARROW_TRUE : ARROW_FALSE);
00438 }
00439 
00440 int
00441 baltsp_dt2_get_cost(arrow_btsp_fun *fun, arrow_problem *base_problem,
00442                     int min_cost, int max_cost, int i, int j)
00443 {
00444     baltsp_shake_data *data = (baltsp_shake_data *)fun->data;
00445     int cost = base_problem->get_cost(base_problem, i, j);
00446     
00447     if((cost >= min_cost) && (cost <= max_cost))
00448     {
00449         int pos = -1;
00450         if(!arrow_problem_info_cost_index(data->info, cost, &pos))
00451         {
00452             arrow_print_error("Could not find cost in ordered cost list!");
00453             return data->infinity;
00454         }
00455         return max_cost - cost + data->random_list[pos];
00456     }
00457     else
00458     {
00459         int M = (data->random_list[0] + max_cost - min_cost);
00460         int randnum = arrow_util_random_between(data->random_min, data->random_max);
00461         return M * base_problem->size + randnum;
00462     }
00463 }
00464 
00465 int
00466 baltsp_dt2_initialize(arrow_btsp_fun *fun)
00467 { 
00468     int i, j, temp;
00469     
00470     /* This procedure is the same as the shake one, so reuse this code */
00471     if(!baltsp_shake_initialize(fun))
00472     {
00473         arrow_print_error("Could not create random list");
00474         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00475     }
00476     
00477     baltsp_shake_data *data = (baltsp_shake_data *)fun->data;
00478     
00479     /* Now we need to reverse the list */
00480     for(i = 0; i < (data->info->cost_list_length / 2); i++)
00481     {
00482         j = data->info->cost_list_length - i - 1;
00483         temp = data->random_list[j];
00484         data->random_list[j] = data->random_list[i];
00485         data->random_list[i] = temp;
00486     }
00487         
00488     return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00489 }
00490 
00491 int
00492 baltsp_dt2_feasible(arrow_btsp_fun *fun, arrow_problem *base_problem, 
00493                     int min_cost, int max_cost, double tour_length, int *tour)
00494 {
00495     baltsp_shake_data *data = (baltsp_shake_data *)fun->data;
00496     int M = (data->random_list[0] + max_cost - min_cost) ;
00497     double maxlen = base_problem->size * M * 1.0;    
00498     return (tour_length < maxlen ? ARROW_TRUE : ARROW_FALSE);
00499 }
